title: CarePlan data model based on HL7 equivalent resource
description: Smart Data Models for CarePlan HL7/FHIR resource type

resourceType.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/FHIR-R4/'. This is a CarePlan resource

meta.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/FHIR-R4/Meta'. The metadata about a resource. This is content in the resource that is maintained by the infrastructure. Changes to the content might not always be associated with version changes to the resource.

implicitRules.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/FHIR-R4/uri'. String of characters used to identify a name or a resource

_implicitRules.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/FHIR-R4/Element'. Base definition for all elements in a resource.

language.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/FHIR-R4/code'. A string which has at least one character and no leading or trailing whitespace and where there is no whitespace other than single spaces in the contents

_language.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/FHIR-R4/Element'. Base definition for all elements in a resource.

text.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/FHIR-R4/Narrative'. A human-readable summary of the resource conveying the essential clinical and business information for the resource.

contained.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/FHIR-R4/ResourceList'. These resources do not have an independent existence apart from the resource that contains them - they cannot be identified independently, and nor can they have their own independent transaction scope.

extension.description: Relationship. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/FHIR-R4/Extension'. May be used to represent additional information that is not part of the basic definition of the resource. To make the use of extensions safe and manageable, there is a strict set of governance  applied to the definition and use of extensions. Though any implementer can define an extension, there is a set of requirements that SHALL be met as part of the definition of the extension.

items.description: Optional Extension Element - found in all resources.

anyOf.description: Property. Identifier format of any NGSI entity
Property. Identifier format of any NGSI entity

modifierExtension.description:
Relationship. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/FHIR-R4/Extension'. May be used to represent additional information that is not part of the basic definition of the resource and that modifies the understanding of the element that contains it and/or the understanding of the containing element's descendants. Usually modifier elements provide negation or qualification. To make the use of extensions safe and manageable, there is a strict set of governance applied to the definition and use of extensions. Though any implementer is allowed to define an extension, there is a set of requirements that SHALL be met as part of the definition of the extension. Applications processing a resource are required to check for modifier extensions.

Modifier extensions SHALL NOT change the meaning of any elements on Resource or DomainResource (including cannot change the meaning of modifierExtension itself).

items.description: Optional Extension Element - found in all resources.

anyOf.description: Property. Identifier format of any NGSI entity
Property. Identifier format of any NGSI entity

identifier.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/FHIR-R4/Identifier'. Business identifiers assigned to this care plan by the performer or other systems which remain constant as the resource is updated and propagates from server to server.

items.description: An identifier - identifies some entity uniquely and unambiguously. Typically this is used for business identifiers.

instantiatesCanonical.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/FHIR-R4/canonical'. The URL pointing to a FHIR-defined protocol, guideline, questionnaire or other definition that is adhered to in whole or in part by this CarePlan.

items.description: A URI that is a reference to a canonical URL on a FHIR resource

instantiatesUri.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/FHIR-R4/uri'. The URL pointing to an externally maintained protocol, guideline, questionnaire or other definition that is adhered to in whole or in part by this CarePlan.

items.description: String of characters used to identify a name or a resource
Base definition for all elements in a resource.

basedOn.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/FHIR-R4/Reference'. A care plan that is fulfilled in whole or in part by this care plan.

items.description: A reference from one resource to another.

replaces.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/FHIR-R4/Reference'. Completed or terminated care plan whose function is taken by this new care plan.

items.description: A reference from one resource to another.

partOf.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/FHIR-R4/Reference'. A larger care plan of which this particular care plan is a component or step.

items.description: A reference from one resource to another.

status.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/FHIR-R4/code'. A string which has at least one character and no leading or trailing whitespace and where there is no whitespace other than single spaces in the contents

_status.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/FHIR-R4/Element'. Base definition for all elements in a resource.

intent.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/FHIR-R4/code'. A string which has at least one character and no leading or trailing whitespace and where there is no whitespace other than single spaces in the contents

_intent.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/FHIR-R4/Element'. Base definition for all elements in a resource.

category.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/FHIR-R4/CodeableConcept'. Identifies what "kind" of plan this is to support differentiation between multiple co-existing plans; e.g. "Home health", "psychiatric", "asthma", "disease management", "wellness plan", etc.

items.description: A concept that may be defined by a formal reference to a terminology or ontology or may be provided by text.

title.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/FHIR-R4/string'. A sequence of Unicode characters

_title.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/FHIR-R4/Element'. Base definition for all elements in a resource.

description.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/FHIR-R4/string'. A sequence of Unicode characters

_description.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/FHIR-R4/Element'. Base definition for all elements in a resource.

subject.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/FHIR-R4/Reference'. A reference from one resource to another.

encounter.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/FHIR-R4/Reference'. A reference from one resource to another.

period.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/FHIR-R4/Period'. A time period defined by a start and end date and optionally time.

created.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/FHIR-R4/dateTime'. A date, date-time or partial date (e.g. just year or year + month).  If hours and minutes are specified, a time zone SHALL be populated. The format is a union of the schema types gYear, gYearMonth, date and dateTime. Seconds must be provided due to schema type constraints but may be zero-filled and may be ignored.                 Dates SHALL be valid dates.

_created.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/FHIR-R4/Element'. Base definition for all elements in a resource.

author.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/FHIR-R4/Reference'. A reference from one resource to another.

contributor.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/FHIR-R4/Reference'. Identifies the individual(s) or organization who provided the contents of the care plan.

items.description: A reference from one resource to another.

careTeam.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/FHIR-R4/Reference'. Identifies all people and organizations who are expected to be involved in the care envisioned by this plan.

items.description: A reference from one resource to another.

addresses.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/FHIR-R4/Reference'. Identifies the conditions/problems/concerns/diagnoses/etc. whose management and/or mitigation are handled by this plan.

items.description: A reference from one resource to another.

supportingInfo.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/FHIR-R4/Reference'. Identifies portions of the patient's record that specifically influenced the formation of the plan.  These might include comorbidities, recent procedures, limitations, recent assessments, etc.

items.description: A reference from one resource to another.

goal.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/FHIR-R4/Reference'. Describes the intended objective(s) of carrying out the care plan.

items.description: A reference from one resource to another.

activity.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/FHIR-R4/CarePlan_Activity'. Identifies a planned action to occur as part of the plan.  For example, a medication to be used, lab tests to perform, self-monitoring, education, etc.

items.description: Describes the intention of how one or more practitioners intend to deliver care for a particular patient, group or community for a period of time, possibly limited to care for a specific condition or set of conditions.

note.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/FHIR-R4/Annotation'. General notes about the care plan not covered elsewhere.

items.description: A  text note which also  contains information about who made the statement and when.

type.description: Property. NGSI Entity type. It has to be 'CarePlan'
